A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unlike many fans\, I focused on the good parts of the movie instead of the bad. To be honest\, REALLY liked this movie! What I don't think many people realize is that this is a transition movie. It's here to provide a segway from TFA to the next movie. I understand that Luke was disappointing\, and that the canto-blight sequence pointless\, but that was only part of the movie. Besides that\, the effects were great and it had all of the action you would expect in a Star Wars movie. All and all\, i liked it! you don't need to agree with me on that\, but remember one thing. At least it's better than the prequels.
